scripts.build: yarn run patch-js && yarn run build-css && yarn run build-js && yarn run copy-hard-coding
scripts.deploy-test: aws s3 sync build/static s3://test-justnote-web/static --size-only --delete --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=31536000 --profile justnote && aws s3 sync build s3://test-justnote-web --exclude static/* --size-only --delete --acl public-read --profile justnote && aws s3 cp build/.well-known/apple-app-site-association s3://test-justnote-web/.well-known/apple-app-site-association --acl public-read --content-type application/json --profile justnote && aws s3 cp build/service-worker.js s3://test-justnote-web/service-worker.js --acl public-read --cache-control no-cache --profile justnote && aws s3 cp build/index.html s3://test-justnote-web/index.html --acl public-read --cache-control no-cache --profile justnote && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E16T92AA3CQF3P --paths /index.html /.well-known/* --profile justnote
scripts.deploy-prod: aws s3 sync build/static s3://justnote-web/static --size-only --delete --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=31536000 --profile justnote && aws s3 sync build s3://justnote-web --exclude static/* --size-only --delete --acl public-read --profile justnote && aws s3 cp build/.well-known/apple-app-site-association s3://justnote-web/.well-known/apple-app-site-association --acl public-read --content-type application/json --profile justnote && aws s3 cp build/service-worker.js s3://justnote-web/service-worker.js --acl public-read --cache-control no-cache --profile justnote && aws s3 cp build/index.html s3://justnote-web/index.html --acl public-read --cache-control no-cache --profile justnote && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E1G6UHDXNDOUN --paths /index.html /.well-known/* --profile justnote
